item.title: HackTheBox :: Postman Write Up
item.description: Reconnaissance Let’s run a quick nmap scan as always. # nmap -sV -sC -O -oA nmap/initial 10.10.10.160 Short explanation: -sV Version detection -sC Script scan -O Enable OS detection -oA Output to all formats For a more detailed explanation click here. While I wait for this to be finished I’ll start a full nmap scan. # nmap -sV -sC -O -p- -oA nmap/initial 10.10.10.160 As usual we have port 22 and port 80 running, but here we also have http protocol running on port 10000, let’s enumerate on those pages.
